data.message: Facebook, going off what Lisa Mynhier Bennett said, why is it ok to show pictures of Kim Kardashian's naked body (uncovered, uncensored) but not ok to post pictures of little kids re-enacting Coppertone ads or women breastfeeding?  I don't really care to see pictures of women breastfeeding but I fail to understand why one is acceptable and the other is not.

replies.message: 'Cause they like bein' a Double Standard FB. It's OK only as long as they love it!!!
Funny how FB will respond to people just saying "Hello" but they have ignored my post.
